metadata.title: CVE-2021-29279 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a integer overflow in function filter_core/filter_props.c:gf_props_assign_value in GPAC 1.0.1. In which, the arg const GF_PropertyValue *value,maybe value->value.data.size is a negative number. In result, memcpy in gf_props_assign_value failed.

criterions.comment: gpac package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
